procedure.title: Set Up a New Rails Project

step.para: Go to the folder where you want your rails project
Run the command: $ rails new omr_kencortez

procedure.step: The setup will also run bundle insall to fetch needed gems
In the end there should be a named project folder with a bunch of directories in that file

step.para: Move into the project folder and run the command $ rails server
This starts a little server called WEBrick and runs in the browser
This basically means on your computer at port 3000
